forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this morning then becoming windy with rain developing this afternoon. High 11C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy this morning then becoming windy with rain developing this afternoon. High 51F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Low 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 46F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 51F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. High 53F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low around 5C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low 41F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 48F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 43F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High near 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 42F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 41F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low near 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
